summary: This is the very first mod I have made so it might not be the best but its a medium steel sword with the absorb health enchantment.
descriptionHtml: This is the very first mod I have made so it might not be the best but its a medium steel sword with the absorb health enchantment. I plan on making more and better mods in the future as well update my mods it can be found in Alvor's house in Riverwood it's just sitting on the floor when you walk in. It will count as stealing when you take it but the id is "43000D63" to add it to your inventory without stealing press ~ then type in "player.additem 43000D63 1"
author: Metorex
